channel.title: [614] Adding a command to spawn items

item.title: [614] Adding a command to spawn items
item.dc:creator: @Bugman43 Bugman43
item.description:
@Bugman43 wrote:

I have a 614 server, however I cannot find the code for the item spawn command. I have searched all over and noone seems to have it. Can somone help? Here is how my other commands look.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 & playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bugman43")) { String text = command.substring(5);

Edit:
Found the code

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights == 3)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100."); }
PLEASE DELETE POST

Read full topic
item.source: [614] Adding a command to spawn items
